original_text: The fountains of the deep and the windows of the heavens were closed, the rain from the heavens was restrained,
korean_text: 깊음의 샘과 하늘의 창문이 닫히고 하늘에서 비가 그치매

sentences.original_text: The fountains of the deep were closed
and the windows of the heavens were closed
the rain from the heavens was restrained
